citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:30pm on
Tuesday, December 3, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, but was told the
licensee was not available for several hours. There was no other facility representative available to assist the inspector
with the inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:30pm on 
Tuesday, December 3, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, but was told the 
licensee was not available for several hours. There was no other facility representative available to assist the inspector 
with the inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
